ygData.subject: Re: Perhaps the pole...
ygData.msgSnippet: The graphic used for the collapsible pole IS different from the standard one.  From the pic it is fairly safe to say that it is indeed tinkered and it does use
ygData.messageBody:
The graphic used for the collapsible pole IS different from the standard
one. From the pic it is fairly safe to say that it is indeed tinkered and
it does use metal rods and/or metal shafts :) I just can't see it being in
a shop, it would've been found a LONG time ago...

-Luke
Tinkering guide website:
http://www.eqportal.com/tinkering



At 11:27 PM 8/22/99 -0000, you wrote:
>From: sragan@...
>
>
>With all the combinations that we have tried, perhaps the collapsable
fishing pole *IS* in a shop somewhere. The graphic is the same one used for
a regular fishing pole, I could see how it would easily be over looked.
>
>Lets shift gears and start hunting, put up where you have looked on the
board and we will scout the planet for this sucker...
>
>Cheers,
>
>FizzWizz of tunare
>
